game.title: The Missing Princess
game.objective: Find the lost princess of the kingdom.
game.description: The princess of the kingdom has gone missing and the king has hired your party to find her. She was last seen leaving the castle for a walk in the forest.
game.reward: 10,000 gold, a new weapon or armor, and the gratitude of the kingdom.

task.objective: Talk to Lord Harrington for more information about the princess's disappearance.
task.description: Lord Harrington is the king's most trusted advisor and he may know more about the princess's disappearance.

task.objective: Search the forest for any clues.
task.description: The princess was last seen in the forest. Search the area carefully.

task.objective: If found, follow clues to locate and rescue the princess.
task.description: If you find her, bring her back to the castle as quickly as possible.

task.objective: Return the princess to the castle safely.
task.description: Ensure the princess's safe return to the castle's courtyard.
